Assemble NocoDB URL

Source: R/nocodb.gen.R
assemble_url.Rd

Assemble NocoDB URL

Usage

assemble_url(
  ...,
  .scheme = "https",
  .hostname = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "hostname", pkg = this_pkg)
)

Arguments

...

Optional path components added to the base URL.

.scheme

Scheme to use in the assembled URL. A character scalar.

.hostname

Hostname to use in the assembled URL. A character scalar.

Value

A character scalar.

Examples

try(
  nocodb:::assemble_url("api/v2/meta/bases/")
)
#> Error in pal::pkg_config_val(key = "hostname", pkg = this_pkg) : 
#>   Please set the nocodb package configuration option hostname by either setting the R option nocodb.hostname or the environment variable
#> `R_NOCODB_HOSTNAME`.
